actions.name: Crackling Fury
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares an Attack.

Effect: The triggering Attack has its Power increase by 40%, and it gains [Recoil 1/6] until the end of the user's Activation. While the user meets the [Desperation 1/3] Condition, this bonus increases to 70%.

actions.name: Plasma Fists
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all of the the user's Normal Type attacks become Electric Type for 5 Activations.

system.description:
Trigger: The user declares an Attack.

Effect: Connection - Plasma Fists. The triggering Attack has its Power increase by 40%, and it gains [Recoil 1/6] until the end of the user's Activation. While the user meets the [Desperation 1/3] Condition, this bonus increases to 70%.
